dublin_core.dcvalue: Telesurgery uses wireless networking and robotic technology to allow surgeons to operate on patients who are distantly located This technology not only benefits today s shortage of surgeons but it also eliminates geographical barriers that prevent timely and high quality surgical intervention financial burden complications and often risky long distance travel The system also provides improved surgical accuracy and ensures the safety of surgeons In this paper we describe the current trend of telesurgery s innovative developments and its future
